summary: A test suite that validates the TwoQubitWeylDecomposition implementation, checking its ability to decompose a range of two‑qubit gates, handle edge‑case parameter sets, and support object serialization and string representation.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the two‑qubit Weyl decomposition utility used in quantum circuit synthesis, ensuring it works for standard gates and can be persisted or inspected reliably.
